wf_workflow_version.description: Workflow for insuring the Player Is Ready.
wf_workflow_version.name: SubFlowTest_Ready_Zombie_Player
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

wf_workflow.description: Workflow for insuring the Player Is Ready.
wf_workflow.name: SubFlowTest_Ready_Zombie_Player

wf_activity.name: Alert Player Failed Location Assignment and is NOT Ready

sys_variable_value.value: gs.addErrorMessage("wfZW_apflanr.1-- Player Location FAILED Assignment and is NOT Ready!!");
gs.addErrorMessage("wfZW_apflanr.1-- Player Location FAILED Assignment and is NOT Ready!!");

activity.display_value: Alert Player Failed Location Assignment and is NOT Ready

wf_activity.name: Confirm Player Location Assigned and Now Ready

sys_variable_value.value: gs.addInfoMessage("wfZW_cplanr.1-- Player Location Assigned and is Now Ready!!");
gs.addInfoMessage("wfZW_cplanr.1-- Player Location Assigned and is Now Ready!!");

activity.display_value: Confirm Player Location Assigned and Now Ready

to.display_value: Confirm Player Location Assigned and Now Ready

from.display_value: Alert Player Failed Location Assignment and is NOT Ready
Confirm Player Location Assigned and Now Ready

to.display_value: Alert Player Failed Location Assignment and is NOT Ready
